Title: Mother of Indonesian president passed away at age 77
Content: The mother of Indonesian president Joko Widodo passed away in Solo; a small town in Central Java; on Wednesday (25 March) at 4.45 pm local time at the age of 77. The cause of her death is still unknown. The news was earlier spread through group messages via p…
